text: @realDonaldTrump It's called the "Pulitzer Prize," chucklehead, and you wouldn't recognize sarcasm if it smacked you in the face. The only time you ever approached sarcasm was when you were told Romney was exposed to COVID-19 and you said "What a pity." #WorstPresidentEver
